mapper.select: select a.no, b.title, a.quiz, a.ex1, a.ex2, a.ex3, a.ex4, a.answer, a.accept, a.book_no as bookNo from quiz a, book b where a.book_no=b.no order by a.no desc
mapper.update: update quiz set accept=#{accept} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select * from quiz where no=#{no} and answer=#{selected}
